title: How can I store my photo data to the cloud without it still taking up space on my phone but still ac
content: I would like to store all my pics and videos to some sort of Google app where it's not being stored on my device. Or is that even possible? I feel like I have multiples of almost every pic or pics I can't find anymore... I still want to access my pics and videos. I have a One Account and want to use that if possible to store... Not just "back up".
